House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00016
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING SECTION ONE OF REPUBLIC ACT NUMBERED NINE THOUSAND THREE HUNDRED FORTY-SIX OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "AN ACT PROHIBITING THE IMPOSITION OF DEATH PENALTY IN THE PHILIPPINES"
ABSTRACT : Restores the death penalty for heinous crimes covered under Republic Act No. 9165, otherwise known as the Comprehensive Dangerous Drugs Act of 2002, as amended, by amending Section 1 of RA09346, An Act Prohibiting the Imposition of Death Penalty in the Philippines.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BIAZON, ROZZANO RUFINO B.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
